actor_awards.notes: The most decorated American combat soldier of World War II, he received every military combat award for valor available from the U.S. Army, including the Medal of Honor. He turned to acting after the war and became a popular star of Westerns. He was inducted into the National Cowboy & Western Heritage Museum's Hall of Great Western Performers.

filmography.title: To Hell and Back
filmography.role_description: Murphy plays himself in this autobiographical war film, reenacting his own heroic service during World War II.
filmography.plot: The true story of Audie Murphy's experiences in WWII, from his enlistment as a young man to becoming the most decorated soldier in U.S. history.
filmography.awards: National Board of Review: Top Ten Films

filmography.title: The Red Badge of Courage
filmography.role_description: A young Union soldier in the Civil War who flees from battle but strives to overcome his cowardice and find redemption.
filmography.plot: A young farm boy enlists in the Union Army during the Civil War and faces the terrifying realities of combat, struggling with his own fear and desire for courage.
filmography.awards: BAFTA: Nomination â€“ Best Film from any Source

filmography.title: The Unforgiven
filmography.role_description: The hot-headed and prejudiced brother in a frontier family who clashes with his adopted sister's Native American heritage.
filmography.plot: A frontier family's secrets are revealed when it is discovered that their adopted daughter is of Native American birth, sparking conflict with the local tribe and neighbors.

filmography.title: No Name on the Bullet
filmography.role_description: A calm, philosophical professional assassin whose mere presence in a town causes the guilt-ridden locals to turn on each other.
filmography.plot: A notorious hired killer arrives in a small town, sparking paranoia among the citizens who all fear they are his intended target.

filmography.title: Night Passage
filmography.role_description: A charismatic outlaw who finds himself on the opposite side of the law from his older brother.
filmography.plot: A railroad troubleshooter is hired to guard a payroll from bandits, only to discover that the gang's leader is his own wayward brother.

filmography.title: The Quiet American
filmography.role_description: An idealistic young American aid worker in Vietnam whose naive interventions have tragic consequences.
filmography.plot: A cynical British journalist and a young American idealist clash over politics and a woman in 1950s Vietnam.

filmography.title: Destry
filmography.role_description: A mild-mannered deputy sheriff who refuses to wear a gun but cleans up a lawless town using his wits.
filmography.plot: A small town sheriff calls in the son of a famous lawman to help restore order, but is surprised when the young man arrives without a gun.

filmography.title: The Duel at Silver Creek
filmography.role_description: A young gunslinger known as the Silver Kid who teams up with a marshal to take down a gang of claim jumpers.
filmography.plot: A marshal and a young gunfighter join forces to stop a gang of claim jumpers who are murdering miners.

filmography.title: Ride Clear of Diablo
filmography.role_description: A railroad surveyor who becomes a deputy sheriff to avenge the murder of his father and brother.
filmography.plot: A man seeking revenge for his family's murder teams up with a notorious outlaw to expose a corrupt sheriff and lawyer.

filmography.title: Walk the Proud Land
filmography.role_description: A real-life Indian agent who tries to bring peace and fair treatment to the Apache reservation.
filmography.plot: An Indian agent tries to implement a new approach of self-government for the Apaches, facing resistance from the army and the public.

filmography.title: The Guns of Fort Petticoat
filmography.role_description: An army officer who deserts to warn and train a group of Texas women to defend themselves against an impending Indian attack.
filmography.plot: During the Civil War, an Army officer trains a group of women at a remote fort to defend themselves against Comanche raiders.

filmography.title: World in My Corner
filmography.role_description: A young boxer from the slums who fights his way to the top but struggles with the corruption of the sport.
filmography.plot: A rising boxer falls for a wealthy woman and gets mixed up with a crooked promoter to fund his new lifestyle.

filmography.title: Joe Butterfly
filmography.role_description: A photographer for a military magazine in post-war Japan who gets involved with a local con artist.
filmography.plot: American soldiers in occupied Japan try to produce a magazine issue while dealing with a wily local black marketeer.

filmography.title: Posse from Hell
filmography.role_description: A tough gunslinger deputy who forms a posse to hunt down four escaped death row inmates.
filmography.plot: A deputy marshal leads a posse of misfits to catch four escaped convicts who have taken a local woman hostage.

filmography.title: Battle at Bloody Beach
filmography.role_description: A civilian adventurer who supplies guerrillas in the Philippines while searching for his missing wife.
filmography.plot: An American civilian joins Filipino guerrillas fighting the Japanese in WWII while searching for his wife who disappeared during the invasion.

filmography.title: The Cimarron Kid
filmography.role_description: A young man falsely accused of a crime who joins the Dalton gang and becomes a notorious outlaw.
filmography.plot: Wrongly accused of aiding a train robbery, a man joins the Dalton gang and eventually takes over leadership.

filmography.title: Seven Ways from Sundown
filmography.role_description: A rookie Texas Ranger assigned to capture a seasoned and charming outlaw.
filmography.plot: A novice Texas Ranger captures a legendary outlaw, but the two men develop a mutual respect during the long journey back to jail.

filmography.title: Hell Bent for Leather
filmography.role_description: A horse trader who is mistaken for a wanted murderer and must prove his innocence.
filmography.plot: An innocent man is mistaken for a killer and pursued by a glory-seeking marshal who knows he's innocent but wants the credit for a capture.

filmography.title: Six Black Horses
filmography.role_description: A cowboy forced to escort a woman across dangerous Indian territory, unaware she plans to kill the man accompanying them.
filmography.plot: Two cowboys are hired by a woman to escort her across hostile territory, not knowing she plans to use one of them to kill the other.

filmography.title: Showdown
filmography.role_description: A cowboy who gets chained to a criminal and breaks free, only to be hunted by the gang.
filmography.plot: Two cowboys are chained to a post with a gang of criminals; when they escape, they must outwit the gang to survive.

filmography.title: Gunfight at Comanche Creek
filmography.role_description: A detective who goes undercover to infiltrate a gang that breaks criminals out of jail to kill them for reward money.
filmography.plot: A detective poses as a wanted outlaw to infiltrate a gang that frees prisoners only to murder them later for the bounty.

filmography.title: The Quick Gun
filmography.role_description: A gunfighter who returns to his hometown to reclaim his father's ranch and help defend the town from a gang.
filmography.plot: A former gunfighter returns home to find the town threatened by a gang of outlaws planning a robbery.

filmography.title: Bullet for a Badman
filmography.role_description: A former Texas Ranger who must track down an outlaw who is also his ex-friend and the father of his adopted son.
filmography.plot: A retired Ranger hunts down a bank robber who happens to be his former friend and enemy, leading to a tense standoff.

filmography.title: Apache Rifles
filmography.role_description: A cavalry captain tasked with rounding up Apaches who struggles with his prejudice and duty.
filmography.plot: A cavalry officer battles Apache Indians and white miners while trying to maintain peace in the Arizona Territory.

filmography.title: Arizona Raiders
filmography.role_description: A former Quantrill Raider who is released from prison to hunt down the rest of his old gang as an Arizona Ranger.
filmography.plot: An ex-Quantrill Raider joins the Arizona Rangers to hunt down his former gang members in exchange for a pardon.

filmography.title: Gunpoint
filmography.role_description: A sheriff who relentlessly pursues an outlaw gang into New Mexico to rescue a kidnapped woman.
filmography.plot: A sheriff pursues a gang of train robbers across the desert to rescue a kidnapped saloon singer.

filmography.title: The Texican
filmography.role_description: A former lawman living in Mexico who returns to Texas to clear his name and avenge his brother's murder.
filmography.plot: A wrongly accused man returns from exile in Mexico to find the man who framed him and killed his brother.

filmography.title: 40 Guns to Apache Pass
filmography.role_description: A cavalry captain who must protect a shipment of repeating rifles from Apaches and a mutinous corporal.
filmography.plot: A cavalry officer must get a shipment of rifles through Apache territory while dealing with a traitor in his ranks.

filmography.title: Bad Boy
filmography.role_description: A troubled juvenile delinquent who is sent to a boys' ranch for rehabilitation; Murphy's first starring role.
filmography.plot: A young criminal is given a second chance at a boys' ranch, where he struggles to overcome his rebellious nature.

filmography.title: Kansas Raiders
filmography.role_description: A young Jesse James who joins Quantrill's Raiders during the Civil War, seeking revenge.
filmography.plot: Jesse James and his brother join Quantrill's Raiders during the Civil War, participating in the violent Lawrence Massacre.

filmography.title: Tumbleweed
filmography.role_description: A wagon train guard wrongly accused of cowardice who must prove his innocence with the help of his horse.
filmography.plot: A guard is accused of deserting a wagon train during an Indian attack and must find the truth to clear his name.
